Title: Arctic Hayes IR99 3 in 1 thermometer
Description: A handy all-in-one instrument, the Arctic Hayes IR99 3-in-1 thermometer is a clamp thermometer, infrared thermometer and stem thermometer at once.
category: Trade Essentials/Test Equipment and Detection/Heating System Test Equipment/Heating System Test Equipment.csv -> Arctic Hayes IR99 3 in 1 thermometer

Title: Testo 830-T2 infrared thermometer
Description: With a two-point laser measurement spot marker and 12:1 optics, the Testo 830-T2 infrared temperature gun supplies quick measurements with no need for direct contact. It has a high resolution processor for precision measuring to an accuracy of 0.1°C as well as a minimum/maximum function and the option to display the limit values of the last measurement for better monitoring. Offering universal use, this infrared thermometer has a long battery life for reliable use all day long.
category: Trade Essentials/Test Equipment and Detection/Heating System Test Equipment/Heating System Test Equipment.csv -> Testo 830-T2 infrared thermometer

Title: Testo 410-1 pocket air velocity/ambient temperature probe
Description: Used to measure air velocity and air temperature, the conveniently compact Testo 410-1 pocket-sized vane anemometer is a flow velocity measuring instrument designed for quick and easy spot checks on ventilation outlets. With integrated measurements carried out through its 30mm vane, the 410-1 is also able to produce a timed mean value calculation as well as wind chill and air humidity calculations. The 410-1 has an impressive battery life of up to 100 hours for reliable use time and time again.
category: Trade Essentials/Test Equipment and Detection/Heating System Test Equipment/Heating System Test Equipment.csv -> Testo 410-1 pocket air velocity/ambient temperature probe

Title: Testo 300 FGA smart + Testo 550i Smart Heat Pump Kit
Description: Compatible with traditional gas and oil boilers, the Testo FGA Smart + Testo 550i smart heat pump kit also provides everything you'll need to carry out measurements on monobloc or split system heat pumps. It includes the Testo 300 Smart flue gas analyser, used for boiler commissioning and installations and the 550i Smart manifold for heat pump service. Also included are two Testo 115i Bluetooth pipe clamp thermometers for boiler or monobloc heat pump flow/return temperature measurement and the 510i digital manometer for gas pressure testing.
category: Trade Essentials/Test Equipment and Detection/Heating System Test Equipment/Heating System Test Equipment.csv -> Testo 300 FGA smart + Testo 550i Smart Heat Pump Kit

Title: Testo 550I Heat Pump Kit
Description: Offering complete app-based, wireless measurement and documentation, the Testo 550i heat pump kit includes the Bluetooth-ready 550i digital manifold, two-way valve block and a robust hook. Two 115i smart probes supply wireless temperature measurement on either flow or return pipework or for superheat/subcooling calculation, while the Testo 770-3 clamp meter offers compressor current measurement and electrical testing. This kit is compatible with both monobloc and split system heat pumps and is also suitable for general refrigeration and air-conditioning service applications too.
category: Trade Essentials/Test Equipment and Detection/Heating System Test Equipment/Heating System Test Equipment.csv -> Testo 550I Heat Pump Kit

Title: Testo 868S Thermal Imaging Camera
Description: Offering high levels of thermal image quality, the Testo 868s thermal imager uses an integrated digital camera complete with Bluetooth connection, allowing you to turn your smartphone into a secondary display via the Testo Thermography app. The app also allows for remote operation of the imager and for the on-site creation and sending of reports, meaning there's no need to head back into the office to carry out admin.

Title: Testo 865S Thermal Imaging Camera
Description: An ideal entry-level thermal imager, the Testo 865s offers excellent image quality and easy operation via a modern tile-type layout. Compact and robust, this palm-top imager will stand up to everyday use and is used by simply turning on, pointing and shooting, meaning there's no need for in-depth learning before you hit the site. Useful features, including IFOV-Warner and ScaleAssist help users to make the most of their instrument while free software simplifies report creation.
